name: Click King 👑 (Multiplayer)
description:
Click King 👑 is a multiplayer idle/tycoon game. Create a team, rise to the top, or join your friends against other teams. 

Tips:

  • To reload the leaderboard,  click back, then leaderboard. I'm working on an automatic reloading system, but it's not working rn.
  • When clicking fast, the click counter looks as if it's not tracking. 99.99% of the time it is, wait a few seconds for it to catch up.
